lead_paragraph: Newcastle United manager Steve McClaren said he was confident of staying in charge despite his relegation-threatened side suffering a sixth straight away Premier League defeat at Stoke City on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: McClaren Defends Position After Another Newcastle Defeat
headline.main: McClaren Defends Position After Another Newcastle Defeat

snippet: Newcastle United manager Steve McClaren said he was confident of staying in charge despite his relegation-threatened side suffering a sixth straight away Premier League defeat at Stoke City on Wednesday....
